paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses various variants in the TTR gene associated with transthyretin amyloidosis, including their clinical significance, penetrance data, and patient demographics.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Among those, 11 patients were asymptomatic mutation carriers [Val20Ile (n=7), Val122Ile (n=1), Cys10Arg (n=1), Ile107Val (n=1), Ile84Thr (n=1)].

functional_data.summary: The Val20Ile variant is associated with reduced stability of the TTR tetramer due to protein misfolding.

variants.segregation_data: The Val20Ile variant segregates with disease in families, as seen in the cohort study.
variants.additional_notes: The study included a total of 89 patients with various TTR mutations.
key_quotes: In our cohort only six patients did not show cardiac manifestation.
This latter group consisted of n=23 patients with the Val30Met mutation.
